channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Frontend Checklist
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Frontend Checklist

item.title: CVE-2024-4957|2024-06-26T19:03:51.593Z -- unknown -- frontend%20checklist
item.description: The Frontend Checklist WordPress plugin through 2.3.2 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
